translator

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • translator.Translator

  • public class Translator
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToDictionary()
      Add To Dictionary Method This method allows the user to add to the dictionary if they choose.

      Display Dictionaries Method This method displays the dictionaries to the user.

      Open Dictionary Method Opens and loads the dictionaries into the program.

      Open Text File Method This method opens up the external text file which needs to be translated

      Process Add Method Processes the users add to the dictionary.

      Remove Words Method This method allows the user to remove words from the dictionary and save the dictionary after doing so.

      Save Dictionary Method This method is used to save the dictionaries contents.

    • Method Detail

      • OpenDictionary

        public void OpenDictionary()
        Open Dictionary Method Opens and loads the dictionaries into the program. This is done using buffered readers and assign the read values to a treemap for each language

      • DisplayDictionaries

        public void DisplayDictionaries()
        Display Dictionaries Method This method displays the dictionaries to the user. This allows the user to see the two dictionaries they have chosen. This is done by making a set copy of the tree map and iterating through it

      • translate

        public void translate()
        Translate Method This method translates the phrase the user enters into the language of their choice. It uses the processTranslation method to do this

      • processTranslation

        public java.lang.String processTranslation(int userChoice,
                                           java.lang.String phraseToTranslate,
                                           java.util.TreeMap dictionary)
        Process Translation Method This method processes the phrase that the user has entered. It translates it from the entered language to the language the user has chosen.
        Parameters:
        userChoice -
        phraseToTranslate -
        dictionary -
        Returns:

      • translateFile

        public void translateFile(java.lang.String[] textFile)
        Translate File Method This method translates an external file into the language of the users choice. It has the text file passed in from the Open Text File method
        Parameters:
        textFile -

      • openTextFile

        public java.lang.String[] openTextFile()
        Open Text File Method This method opens up the external text file which needs to be translated
        Returns:

      • addToDictionary

        public void addToDictionary()
        Add To Dictionary Method This method allows the user to add to the dictionary if they choose.

      • processAdd

        public void processAdd(java.util.TreeMap dictionary)
        Process Add Method Processes the users add to the dictionary. The user is asked to enter for each language, however if they do not know the translation they can leave it blank
        Parameters:
        dictionary -

      • saveDictionary

        public void saveDictionary()
        Save Dictionary Method This method is used to save the dictionaries contents.

      • removeWords

        public void removeWords()
        Remove Words Method This method allows the user to remove words from the dictionary and save the dictionary after doing so.
